April 6, 2025 - The Positec Tool Corporation was founded by Don Gao in 1994 in Suzhou, China. The term "Positec" is a play on "Positive Technology." The company was initially started as an original equipment manufacturer of hand and power tools for established companies and brands like Sears and Black & Decker.
